CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7210SAS-MXP',"Please select the appropriate power cable/plug.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7705SARHC',"Please select the AC power cord appropriate for the installation location.","Please select the appropriate power cable/plug."))
CustomField.label: Power Cord Information
